title: WTF Happened to NA Servers
body: Uhh League of Legends is kind of fked up right now for NA and my friends and I dont know what to do T-T{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey Boo,

Yeah, shit kinda hit the fan last night during some service issues that started shortly after 9:00pm PDT. The issue was later resolved prior to our scheduled maintenance. If you're still having issues, let me know and I'll be happy to help.

Let me know if you have any questions.
